content.text: There are a handful of external development standards and conventions that we encourage developers to familiarize themselves with.

points: 📄 Diátaxis — a systematic approach to technical documentation authoring.
🎎 Semantic Versioning — a versioning scheme for software.
💠 Conventional Commits — a specification for adding human and machine readable meaning to commit messages.
🪵 Keep a Changelog — a specification for maintaining a changelog.
🤝 Contributor Covenant —  code of conduct designed to promote a welcoming and inclusive community.
